suite.name: Gestao-Ferias

test.name: CT01 - Cenário Sucesso: Acesso ao painel de Gestão de Ferias

kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.

kw.name: Set Browser Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout used by most input and getter keywords.

kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options.
kw.msg: { "acceptDownloads": true, "bypassCSP": false, "forcedColors": "none", "hideRfBrowser": false, "ignoreHTTPSErrors": false, "javaScriptEnabled": true, "offline": false, "reducedMotion": "no-preference", "viewport": { "width": 1920, "height": 1080 }, "deprecated_pos_args": [] }

{'acceptDownloads': True, 'bypassCSP': False, 'forcedColors': 'none', 'hideRfBrowser': False, 'ignoreHTTPSErrors': False, 'javaScriptEnabled': True, 'offline': False, 'reducedMotion': 'no-preference', 'viewport': {'width': 1920, 'height': 1080}, 'deprecated_pos_args': []}

kw.name: Dado que acesso painel de gestão de ferias
New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: https://jr-qa.fuerza.space/

kw.name: Get Title
kw.doc: Returns the title of the current page.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Quando a tela é carregada corretamente
Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector (//button[contains(.,'approve_')])[1] at state visible

kw.name: Então visualizo as solicitações de ferias
Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector //img[@alt='The Turnip Avenger'] at state visible

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current window or element and saves it to disk.

New Page

Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: E Preencho o formulario Colaborado com "teste"
Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'teste' in the given field.

kw.name: E Preencho o formulario Gestor com "gestor teste"
Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'gestor teste' in the given field.

kw.name: E Clico no botão "Aprovado" do modal
Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Então o status da solicitação sera atualizado para "Aprovado"
Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector //div[@data-test='4gfvkqfhj4ntneu'][contains(.,'APPROVED')] at state visible

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current window or element and saves it to disk.

suite.doc: Funcionalidade: Painel Gestão de Férias Como usuário Gestor, quero visualizar as solcitações de Ferias , bem como aprovar / reprova-las
